Class LibraryStaff

  • java.lang.Object
    • SystemUser
      • LibraryStaff

  • public class LibraryStaff
extends SystemUser
    The LibraryStaff class represents library staff as a user of the Library Management System It contains such operations as adding or removing books and users All methods return String message indicating result of the request to the underlying database

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class SystemUser

        booksBorrowed, name, password, status, surname

        public java.lang.String addBook(DataBase booksDataBase,
                                java.lang.String bookName,
                                java.lang.String author,
                                int number)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a book to the a database
        Parameters:
        booksDataBase - The books data base
        bookName - The name of the book to be added
        author - The author of the book to be added
        number - The number of the books to be added
        Returns:
        result message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not create a Record using books data
